title: „Gescheiterter Ampelminister, der nichts vorzuweisen hat“ : Südwest-CDU geht Grünen Cem Özdemir hart an
description: Vor der Landtagswahl in Baden-Württemberg am 8. März liegt die CDU in Umfragen klar vorn. Nun greift sie verstärkt den Grünen-Kandidaten Özdemir an, der bekannter ist als der eigene Spitzenmann Manuel Hagel.

title: What do squirrels do during a thunderstorm?

content: During a thunderstorm, squirrels prioritize safety and survival by seeking shelter in secure, pre-existing locations like tree cavities, underground burrows, or nests, remaining quiet and still until… [+9884 chars]

During a thunderstorm, squirrels prioritize safety and survival by seeking shelter in secure, pre-existing locations like tree cavities, underground burrows, or nests, remaining quiet and still until the storm passe…
la: Quid sciuri faciunt in tonitribus? Quid Sciuri Fac Per Procellae Tonitruales? In procellis sciuri prioritizare salutem et salutem quaerere per loca tuta, praeiacentia loca sicut cavitates arborum, subterraneas cuniculos, vel nidos, quiete manentes et usque dum tempestas transeat.

title: What is a pyroCB, a fire-generated thunderstorm?
description: The fire burning in north-east Victoria near Walwa was so fierce it generated its own weather this afternoon, including a substantial pyrocumulonimbus cloud with lightning and thunder.
content:
The fire burning in north-east Victoria near Walwa was so fierce itgenerated its own weather this afternoon, including a substantial pyrocumulonimbus cloud with lightning and thunder.

de: Was ist ein PyroCB, ein durch Feuer erzeugtes Gewitter? Das Feuer im Nordosten von Victoria in der Nähe von Walwa war so heftig, dass es heute Nachmittag sein eigenes Wetter erzeugte, einschließlich einer beträchtlichen Pyrocumulonimbus-Wolke mit Blitz und Donner.
en: What is a pyroCB, a fire-generated thunderstorm?. The fire burning in north-east Victoria near Walwa was so fierce it generated its own weather this afternoon, including a substantial pyrocumulonimbus cloud with lightning and thunder.
la: Quid est pyroCB, ignis generatus tonitribus? Ignis ardens in Victoria septentrionali prope Walwa tam acer erat ut tempestatem suam hac postmeridiana generaret, cum substantialibus pyrocumulonimbus nubes cum fulminibus et tonitruis.

title: Wetter: Ungewöhnlich wenig Blitze in Berlin und Brandenburg

de: Wetter: Ungewöhnlich wenig Blitze in Berlin und Brandenburg. Für ein Gewitter braucht es unter anderem feuchte und energiereiche Luftmassen. Der Sommer 2025 war allerdings ziemlich trocken. Das fällt auch bei der Blitz-Statistik auf.
en: Weather: Unusually few lightning strikes in Berlin and Brandenburg. A thunderstorm requires, among other things, moist and energetic air masses. However, the summer of 2025 was quite dry. This is also noticeable in the lightning statistics.
la: Tempestas: Solent pauca fulmina in Berlin et Brandenburg. Tonitruum requirit, inter cetera, humidum et acerrimum aeris massas. Aestas autem 2025 admodum sicca erat. Hoc quoque notabile est in fulminibus mutant.

de: Wetterfühligkeit: Gewitter in den Knochen. Manche Menschen spüren, wenn sich das Wetter ändert. Für die einen ist es bloß lästig, bei anderen leidet die Lebensqualität deutlich. Was steckt hinter dieser »Wetterfühligkeit«?
en: Weather sensitivity: thunderstorms in the bones. Some people sense when the weather changes. For some it's just annoying, for others the quality of life suffers significantly. What is behind this “weather sensitivity”?
la: Tempestas mollities: Tonitruum ossa. Nonnulli sentiunt cum tempestas mutationes. Aliis molestus suus iustus, aliis vitae qualitas insigniter laborat. Quid est post hanc "tempestatem sensus"?
